const arr = [[2, 5], [1, 2], [3, 8], [10, 1], [2, 9]];
const compare = (a, b) => {
  if(a[0] < b[0]) return -1;
  else if (a[0] > b[0]) return 1;
  else {
    if(a[1] > b[1]) return -1;
    else return 1;
  }
}
console.log(arr.sort(compare));
// [ [ 1, 2 ], [ 2, 9 ], [ 2, 5 ], [ 3, 8 ], [ 10, 1 ] ]
